title: Cowboy Confidential
description: A fast-paced, country-style, hot and steamy, happily ever after!She’s America’s golden girl, award-winning singer-actress Samantha Hayes. But once upon a time, she was Sami Colton, country galWyn Thomas is a ranching cowboy with a bad attitude and a broken heart ~ courtesy of SamiTen years on, Sami turns her back on Hollywood and heads home to Wyoming. Sometimes the boy you left behind means more than a Malibu beach house or a bunch of shiny trophies.What happens when the past smacks head first into the present? Find out when Wyn and Sami come face to face!
author: Gigi Thorne
